divs: Sighting Details I am not a big believer of UFOs, I'm christian, but that night in February I was watching the stars as I always do and looked at a star that was moving very fast in a zig-zag pattern. Then it stopped, and the one light that it had went out. Planes flash red,blue, or white.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Oregon
There were no other sightings in Oregon on or around
